rows.label: qev011101_MSG0001
rows.name: You're human! Good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0002
rows.name:
If I can run into a BLADE all the way out here,
I guess my luck hasn't completely conked out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0003
rows.name:
Anyway, I could use some help on an Outfitter
assignment. What do you say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev011101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask what you can do to help.

rows.label: qev011101_JNK0020
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev011101_SEL0021
rows.name: Inquire about Outfitters and their assignments.

rows.label: qev011101_JNK0030
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev011101_SEL0031
rows.name: Praise Gigio for his dedication to his assignment.

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0004
rows.name:
We came out here on a request from Sakuraba
Industries. They wanted us to test out some new Skell
weapon on the indigens around here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0005
rows.name:
Everything was going fine until this crazed mephite
started attacking![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0006
rows.name:
Didn't someone explain this to you when you picked a
division?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0007
rows.name: The Outfitters support the arms manufacturers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0008
rows.name: We offer this support in a number of ways.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0009
rows.name:
Testing out new weapons is one, but we also help with
production.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hell, I'm sure we had something to do with the gear
you're carrying now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0011
rows.name:
Anyway, we came out here on a request from
Sakuraba Industries. They wanted us to test out some
new Skell weapon on the indigens around here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0012
rows.name:
Everything was going fine until this crazed mephite
started attacking![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0013
rows.name: Hey, I'm a BLADE. All part of the job, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0014
rows.name:
We came out here on a request from Sakuraba
Industries. They wanted us to test out some new Skell
weapon on the local indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0015
rows.name:
Everything was going fine until this crazed mephite
started attacking![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0016
rows.name:
Anyone not inside a Skell was wiped out on the first
swipe...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0017
rows.name: Mine was totaled, but at least it kept me alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0018
rows.name: Problem is, all that weapon-test data is still inside it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0019
rows.name:
This mission came straight from Isobe, Sakuraba's chief
engineer. I'd feel like a total amateur if I let him down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0020
rows.name:
But now that you've shown up, I may have a way out
of this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0021
rows.name:
What do you say? Will you go grab the test data from
the Skell I ditched in Rust Lake?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0022
rows.name:
I'll give you everything Sakuraba's paying usâ€”
that's how much it means to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0023
rows.name: Thank you. And good luck.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0024
rows.name:
I'm going to go find a cave to hide in before something
big and ugly shows up and eats me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0025
rows.name:
If you could retrieve the test data from the Skell I left in
Rust Lake, I'd sure appreciate it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0026
rows.name: Oh, and the mephite that hit us may still be around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0027
rows.name:
So be careful. Veeeeery careful.
Take small steps... Look around a lot... You know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0028
rows.name:
Thanks for the timely rescue. You literally saved me!
...And I literally mean literally.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0029
rows.name:
What kind of world is it where a guy can't hide out
in a nice dank cave? I swear...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0030
rows.name:
Anyway, any luck with the data?
Please say it was still intact.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0031
rows.name: This is it! This is the data I need![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0032
rows.name:
A totaled Skell isn't great news, but getting this data
back makes it all worthwhile. Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_JNK0040
rows.name: Ask

rows.label: qev011101_SEL0041
rows.name: Inquire about the new weapon Gigio was testing out.

rows.label: qev011101_JNK0050
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev011101_SEL0051
rows.name:
Express concern at whether Gigio can return
the data to Sakuraba safely on his own.

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0033
rows.name: Sorry, that's classified. Isobe's got us on a tight leash.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0034
rows.name:
Let's just say it's fun. You won't be able to resist once
this baby hits the market![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0035
rows.name:
I'll be fine. We're close to the forest exit, and I'm
used to Primordia. Thanks for the concern, though.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0036
rows.name: Now, let's get you that reward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0037
rows.name: Not too shabby, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0038
rows.name: Isobe had big expectations on this one, that's for sure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0039
rows.name:
Too bad about the wrecked Skells... And dead guys...
But hey, we got the data, right? Not a total wash.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev011101_MSG0040
rows.name: And that's all thanks to you![ST:wait ]
